DzDockBar Class Reference
[Interface Components]

Detailed Description

Class that encapsulates an extensible toolbar that can be docked with other toolbars.

Member Function Documentation

void DzDockBar::dock ( DzDockBar::DockArea  area,
const QString &  beforeBar = QString::null 
) [slot]

Docks the bar in the specified area on the main window, and shows the bar if it is hidden.

Parameters:
area The DockArea to dock to.
beforeBar The name of the bar in the area to dock before
void DzDockBar::undock ( QPoint &  pos  )  [slot]

Undocks the bar, moves it to the given global coordinates, and shows the bar if it is hidden.
